Literature.Title: Structure, Function, and Biosynthetic Origin of Octapeptin Antibiotics Active against Extensively Drug-Resistant Gram-Negative Bacteria.
Literature.Author: Velkov T, Gallardo-Godoy A, Swarbrick JD, Blaskovich MAT, Elliott AG, Han M, Thompson PE, Roberts KD, Huang JX, Becker B, Butler MS, Lash LH

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa FADDI-PA025(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa FADDI-PA070(MIC=1µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii FADDI-AB156(MIC=>32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii FADDI-AB065(MIC=32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae FADDI-KP032(MIC=2µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae FADDI-KP012(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae FADDI-EC001(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>32µg/ml)
